thread.title: Kim Kardashian reveals she worked on her stretch marks
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian reveals she worked on her stretch marks | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Kim Kardashian reveals she worked on her stretch marks
text:
She's not one to shy away from documenting what goes on inside her doctor appointments.
And Kim Kardashian took to Snapchat on Sunday after visiting her plastic surgeon's office in the early hours of the morning.
The 36-year-old reality star happily told her fans that she and her trusted doctor, Dr. Simone Ourian, 'worked on [her] stretch marks,' though it remains unclear which part of the body.
Scroll down for video
Success! Kim Kardashian took to Snapchat on Sunday after a visit to her plastic surgeon's office, Dr. Simone Ourian, in Beverly Hills where they 'worked on [her] stretch marks'
Driving back from her visit, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star added a quirky bunny animation, which changed her voice to a higher-pitched sound, as she expressed her gratefulness to the doctor.
She said on the social media app: 'I feel so excited that I finally did it.'
Adding: 'I've been so scared to do it thinking it hurts so badly, and it didn't hurt that badly. So I'm so grateful, and I'm so excited. I love you Dr. Ourian.'
'I'm so grateful:' The 36-year-old reality star told her fans she was scared it would hurt badly, but she didn't feel that much pain
Open: Although it remains unclear which area of the body it was, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star is not one to shy away from discussing her doctor visits
The wife of 39-year-old Kanye West left the office dressed in an all-black ensemble, still managing to show off her svelte figure in tight leggings.
She kept it simple with an oversize hooded sweatshirt, bright white sneakers, and accessorized with her leather snakeskin purse and black shades.
Kim later took to Snapchat after her appointment as she snuggled with three-year-old daughter North West as the two played around with the app's filters.
All black: The wife of Kanye West kept it simple to the doctor's office as she dressed in tight and shapely leggings, paired with an oversize hooded sweatshirt
Sleek: She wore her raven tresses down along the sides of her face, matching her black leather purse and sunglasses
Family doctor: Dr. Ourian was also the man responsible for removing Kim's sister Khloe Kardashian's cellulite
In the family: Half sister Kylie Jenner also got her plumped lips done by the same doctor at the Beverly Hills salon
Kim has constantly promoted the cosmetic dermatologist who has helped her and her family maintain their contoured aesthetic.
The star herself underwent laser surgery removing stretch marks from her breasts as well as her sister Khloé Kardashian, 32, who removed her cellulite at the famed Epione salon.
Dr. Ourian also happens to be the plastic surgeon behind 19-year-old Kylie Jenner's plumped lip.
Snuggle times: The mother-of-two also took to Snapchat upon her return home where she cuddled with her daughter North West, three
Sweet: The mother-daughter duo played around with the app's filters, giving the toddler some bunny ears
Meanwhile, Kim has been on her usual go-getter schedule as she jetted to New York Fashion Week earlier this week where she supported Kanye's Yeezy 5 debut collection on the runway.
According to a Thursday report from People , the rapper would like her to attend Paris Fashion Week - just months after her traumatizing experience in October when she was robbed at gunpoint of millions of dollars in jewelry in Paris.
While it is not known if Kim will attend, her half-sister Kendall Jenner will be walking in the runway shows from February 28 until March 8.
Way back when: In an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians three years ago, Kim also went under the needle with Dr. Ourian where she removed marks from her breasts
'For beauty': Kim recently denied having surgery on her famous derriere, but appears to be open to other procedures
